author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Kuwait's Redha Al-Awadhi's gallery opened during 10th Cultural Summer FestivalTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Kuwait’s Redha Al-Awadhi’s gallery opened during 10th Cultural Summer Festival
Kuwait’s Redha Al-Awadhi’s gallery, opened Thursday night, within the 10th Cultural Summer Festival, offering priceless historical collectables.
The gallery offers several antiquities and various historical items that have been collected over the years, Al-Awadhi told KUNA.
Al-Awadhi is fond of photography and he keeps a multitude of Kuwait’s vintage photos.
The gallery includes historical currencies from Jerusalem, to be displayed at the Kuwait National Museum for three months, in addition to an 800-year-old dagger, and many old watches and clocks.
Meanwhile, the Festival schedule includes a concert for Iraq Ali Al-Ward troupe on Saturday (tomorrow), then a workshop on antiquity restoration and maintenance, and a course on writing articles, by Kuwaiti poet, Saedia Al-Mefrah on Sunday.
Minister of Information and Minister of State for Youth Affairs, Sheikh Salman Sabah Salem Al-Humoud Al-Sabah, opened the 10th Cultural Summer Festival at Abdulhussain Abdulredha Theatre in the Salmiya area last Sunday.
